description: Millwall are reportedly interested in signing forward Aaron Connolly from Sunderland.
title: Millwall keen on Sunderland striker Aaron Connolly
title_page: Millwall keen on Sunderland striker Aaron Connolly - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Millwall are interested in signing forward Aaron Connolly from Sunderland. The 24-year-old only signed for the Black Cats in September but has struggled to make an impact and could be available. (Sunderland Echo), external
Want more transfer news from the EFL? Take a look at Tuesday's gossip here.
